hotspots.name: Stairwell
hotspots.text: something about the social history of the building / Picture of the Plans from OPW showing the virtual model being made.  'The rooms round this central hall [Search Room] were given up to searchers, officials and clerks, together with a library, whilst some of the top rooms and all the basement were allocated to the fore and and office keeper for a residence.'
